content:
Hey all! My name is also, Dan! <@318807919112224770> 

I been a programmer for 2 years or so, work mostly in JavaScript but also enjoy React.js and learning about blockchain dev. Looking to learn as much as I can in the coming months.

author: tanishqjasoria
content:
Hello everyone, I am Tanishq.  I recently graduated college with a Masters in Mathematics and Computer Science.
At present, I am working as a Backend Developer at a startup, building algorithmic trading platform for cryptocurrencies. Also, I am part of the third cohort of the Gitcoin KERNEL fellowship. 
I am quite new to ethereum, i started exploring this field around 3 months back. I am interested in exploring, on the protocol level, how different parts in the Ethereum stack works and would love to contribute towards the improvement of the same.
